hero.name: Yang Jinfei
hero.title: Frontend Developer ¬∑ 3 Years Experience ¬∑ ToEverything
hero.subtitle: Passionate about AI technology exploration and innovative applications
hero.description: A frontend developer focused on React technology stack with 3 years of rich experience. Proficient in TypeScript, GraphQL, Tailwind CSS and other modern frontend technologies, participated in AFFiNE open source project development. Skilled in building high-quality, reusable component libraries, committed to creating excellent user experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I am Yang Jinfei, a frontend developer with 3 years of rich experience, currently working at ToEverything (Hangzhou) Co., Ltd. I focus on React technology stack and am proficient in TypeScript, GraphQL, Tailwind CSS and other modern frontend technologies.
about.description2: In my career, I have led and participated in the development of AFFiNE open source project, which is a self-deployable local-first multi-user collaborative knowledge base. I was responsible for frontend architecture design, internationalization implementation, admin panel development and other core functional modules.
about.description3: I am passionate about exploring cutting-edge technologies, 50% vibe coding, and maintain high interest in AI application development. I am committed to building high-quality, reusable component libraries, pursuing excellent user experience and product innovation.

advantages.title: Personal Advantages
advantages.technical: Strong technical foundation with 3+ years of React ecosystem experience
advantages.experience: Rich project experience in open source projects and enterprise applications
advantages.learning: Continuous learning ability, keeping up with frontend technology trends
advantages.teamwork: Excellent teamwork and cross-functional collaboration skills
advantages.innovation: Innovation-driven mindset with passion for exploring new technologies

toeverything.description: Responsible for frontend development of AFFiNE open source project, a self-deployable local-first multi-user collaborative knowledge base. Led frontend architecture design, internationalization implementation, and admin panel development.

achievements.architecture: Led frontend architecture design and established development standards for the team
achievements.i18n: Implemented comprehensive internationalization system supporting multiple languages and regions
achievements.admin: Developed admin panel management system with user management and permission control
achievements.components: Built high-quality, reusable component library improving development efficiency

affine.title: AFFiNE - Open Source Knowledge Base
affine.description: A self-deployable, local-first, multi-user collaborative knowledge base. Core features include block editor, whiteboard, database, and multiple editing modes. I led frontend architecture design, internationalization implementation, and admin panel development.

adminPanel.title: Admin Panel Management System
adminPanel.description: Backend management platform developed for the AFFiNE project using React + TypeScript + GraphQL tech stack, combined with shadcn-ui and Tailwind CSS. Implemented core features including user management, permission control, and data statistics.

i18n.title: Internationalization Multi-language System
i18n.description: Led the design and implementation of internationalization support for the AFFiNE project, supporting multi-language switching and regional adaptation. Built highly reusable responsive components, unified UI style and interaction experience, improving global user experience.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities and interesting projects.
